messages.content: First, check the spelling of the email address. Make sure there are no typos. Second, check if the email address exists. If it does, then the person probably forgot to change their password after creating an account on the website. In that case, you can create a new account using that email address. However, if the email address is fake or already in use, then there is probably some other problem with the account and you should contact customer support for that website.
how to save my broken English

First, check the spelling of the email address. Make sure there are no typos. Second, check if the email address exists. If it does, then the person probably forgot to change their password after creating an account on the website. In that case, you can create a new account using that email address. However, if the email address is fake or already in use, then there is probably some other problem with the account and you should contact customer support for that website.
